sentence.Network_en: This desert of unattractiveness has its oasis.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一片枯燥无味的沙漠上,也有一座绿洲.

sentence.Network_en: Its picture, with fights and so on movement all unusual unattractiveness, until conclusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的画面, 和打斗等动作都非常的漂亮, 直到结束.

for most readers , the lines will appear truncated , or will be wrapped unattractively . please edit it to keep the lines shorter than 80 characters .对于大多数阅读器来说，这些行将被截断，或将被自动换行。请重新编辑，使每行都短于80个字符。
